key.title: The public key of the CT log
key.description: The log's public key as a DER-encoded ASN.1 SubjectPublicKeyInfo structure, then encoded as base64 (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5280#section-4.1.2.7).

log_id.title: The SHA-256 hash of the CT log's public key, base64-encoded
log_id.description: This is the LogID found in SCTs issued by this log (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6962#section-3.2).

mmd.title: The Maximum Merge Delay, in seconds
mmd.description: The CT log should not take longer than this to incorporate a certificate (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6962#section-3).

temporal_interval.description: The log will only accept certificates that expire (have a NotAfter date) between these dates.

start_inclusive.description: All certificates must expire on this date or later.

end_exclusive.description: All certificates must expire before this date.

url.title: The base URL of the CT log's RFC6962-compliant HTTP API
url.description: The API endpoints are defined in https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6962#section-4.

submission_url.title: The static-ct-api-compliant submission prefix of the log
submission_url.description: The API endpoints are defined in https://c2sp.org/static-ct-api

monitoring_url.title: The static-ct-api-compliant monitoring prefix of the log
monitoring_url.description: The API endpoints are defined in https://c2sp.org/static-ct-api
